mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.state AS "state", a.flow_id AS "flow.id", a.pro_id AS "proId", a.appropriation AS "appropriation", a.pro_item_type AS "proItemType", a.rbs_type as "rbsType", a.enclosure AS "enclosure", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", pro.id as "pro.id", pro.pa_number as "pro.paNumber", pro.pro_number as "pro.proNumber", pro.name as "pro.name", dep.id as "oaWxDepartment.id", dep.name as "oaWxDepartment.name", un.id as "oaEosProUn.id", un.name as "oaEosProUn.name", un.pro_number as "oaEosProUn.proNumber"
left join oa_eos_pro pro on pro.id=a.pro_id left join oa_wx_department dep on a.pro_id=dep.id left join oa_eos_pro_un un on un.id=a.pro_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oa_wx_extended_super( id, state, flow_id, pro_id, appropriation, pro_item_type, rbs_type, enclosure, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{state}, #{flow.id}, #{proId}, #{appropriation}, #{proItemType}, #{rbsType}, #{enclosure}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE oa_wx_extended_super SET state = #{state}, flow_id = #{flow.id}, pro_id = #{proId}, appropriation = #{appropriation}, rbs_type= #{rbsType}, enclosure = #{enclosure}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select from oa_wx_extended_super a where a.id in( SELECT distinct b.id FROM oa_wx_extended_super b inner JOIN oa_eos_flow_item flow ON flow.flow_id = b.flow_id WHERE b.del_flag = 0 AND flow.user_id= #{userId} AND flow.status=1 AND rbs_type=1) ORDER BY a.create_date DESC

select from oa_wx_extended_super a where a.id in( SELECT distinct b.id FROM oa_wx_extended_super b inner JOIN oa_eos_flow_item flow ON flow.flow_id = b.flow_id WHERE b.del_flag = 0 and b.state!=0 and b.state!=2 AND rbs_type=1) ORDER BY a.state desc,a.appropriation asc,a.create_date DESC

select from oa_wx_extended_super a where a.id in( SELECT distinct b.id FROM oa_wx_extended_super b inner JOIN oa_eos_flow_item flow ON flow.flow_id = b.flow_id WHERE b.del_flag = 0 AND flow.user_id= #{userId} AND b.state=0 AND flow.status=0 AND rbs_type=1 ) ORDER BY a.create_date DESC
select from oa_wx_extended_super a where a.pro_id=#{proId}

SELECT SUM(a.cost)/100 AS cost FROM `oa_wx_extended` a INNER JOIN `oa_wx_extended_super` b ON a.exte_super=b.id WHERE a.pro_id='0' AND b.pro_id=#{proId} AND b.create_by=#{userId} AND b.appropriation=1
